document.full_text: south africa will bid to host the 2022 commonwealth games having last week pulled out of the race to stage the 2020 summer olympics, the country's olympic federation chief gideon sam said on thursday.
document.title: south africa plans bid for 2022 commonwealth games
lines_and_colors: south africa will bid to host the 2022 commonwealth games having last week pulled out of the race to stage the 2020 summer olympics, the country's olympic federation chief gideon sam said on thursday.
